phrases: There you go, making that depressing face again.
You do not have to worry so much.
She will wake up soon just like Kaname and I did.
It is been one week since Manaka-san came back.
Everyone believed somewhere in their hearts...
What the hell is with English being first period?
That she would be the same as Hikari or Kaname-san.
That she would wake up soon.
Manaka-san still showed no signs of waking up.
That ends our lesson for today.
Those who finish cleaning first can go home.
I know it is a lot of homework, but do not forget it.
Let us get the bathroom cleaning over with!
Today's the day I am going to catch that Uroko!
Uroko-sama may know a way to wake Manaka up.
Yeah, considering he is the one who made everyone hibernate.
I am going to leave you behind.
I thought that Hikari would be more panicked about Manaka-san,
Is Manaka-san at your house by herself during the day?
My mom's been getting days off from Saya Mart to take care of her.
Where the hell is he hiding?
I think it is a lot lower since the day we found Manaka in Shishio.
Could it be that the Sea God is angry?
It is not a big deal.
All we have to do is come up to the surface
once in a while and warm up.
You have not rested since you came back up...
It is no problem at all.
She said she would be late because of her internship...
I am going to go take a look again.
You do not need to go to Shishio with the others, Miuna?
I have decided to leave Shishio
I was just thinking that since we are all the same age now,
it would be nice if we could do more things together.
And it would be even nicer if we could get closer to their circle.
How about stimulating her five senses?
Like stimulating her ears by playing her a song?
Miuna-chan said she met him in the village.
Let us take a look at the outskirts of the village, too.
It reminds me of the day of the Ofunehiki.
Manaka heard this song, too, right?
I think I might have come up with a good idea.
Local Mascot Character Name Ideas: Oshiosshii Sea Slug-kun Narunamimaru
If we let her listen to things from the festival,
Scenes from that day will come up in her head.
We think that might just wake Manaka up.
But people have been coming and going quite a bit since then...
I will go contact some people, so could you wait a little while?
Thanks for your hard work, you two.
Chisaki-chan and Kaname are with him, too, right?
I was a little worried about those three at first, but...
Chisaki-chan's been coming by a lot more often lately.
Now if only Manaka-chan would wake up...
By the way, apparently Hikari and the others
asked the fishery cooperative to record the song for them.
He is gathering people from the Ofunehiki five years ago
in the hope that it might wake Manaka-chan up.
I think Itaru-san was pretty happy because he called me about it.
Even though he was not the one who thought of it, he is super excited.
I could not catch Uroko today either.
We got a lot of homework today, so let us do it together.
There really is not that much time.
Maybe I will take some time off from school.
That will give me a lot more time,
and I will be able to do a lot more.
we are still required to go to school!
What are you being all serious for?
And Mom will be really worried!
If she does not ever wake up...
What the hell do you mean by that?
I just have to go to school, right?
That is not what I wanted to say...
I was fine just the way I was.
the sea and the surface kept freezing...
He left for the sea a while ago.
He said he would go to school straight from there.
What do you think you are doing?
And so, the Warring States era finally came to an end...
People who push their own feelings onto others are awful, are not they?
I am talking about the protagonist in this book.
You are not allowed to read books that do not concern Manaka-san today.
But we have been sitting here for three hours.
or rather, what are you reading?
It is an actual relevant book.
Learning About Sleep The True State of Hypnosis
Is not that a little off?
We do not know where we will find a clue about her waking up.
Are you actually thinking about this?
You know, I have been thinking...
Do not princes do that often?
I think someone should try that
I think that strong feelings for someone
have the power to change something drastically.
There are people who have that...
B-But it would not be good to kiss her
if there is no solid proof that it will help.
Well, do you have a better idea?
You sound like you do not really want Manaka-san to wake up.
You are the one who just said we do not know where we might find a clue.
I am being pretty serious about this...
Do I really not want Manaka-san to wake up?
I guess I will go look for Uroko-sama again.
I want Manaka-san to wake up...
That is what I should have been thinking this whole time.
Was I the only one that was somewhere else?
I will have him stay home from school tomorrow.
You should get to bed, too, Miuna.
It will be no good if everyone keels over.
Is not it almost time for you to leave for school?
let us just say that she does.
Apparently Miuna and Hikari have a cold.
The sea's cold, and you have been going in with Hikari, right?
Even though Miuna and I and everyone else are here, too.
I will have to take notes for three people today.
Miuna's been taking notes for Manaka-san for when she wakes up.
I will help with taking notes.
so I am going to take Akira and go shopping.
Keep an eye on the house.
And you told Hikari not to rest...
Do I really not want Manaka-san to wake up?
I have to go find Uroko-sama...
I am going to be the one who wakes her up...
It is going to be me...
Hikari is always so straight and narrow and bright.
his feelings for Manaka-san make him like that.
It is been reported that just like in mountain climbing and free diving,
when you put yourself into dangerous situations,
there is a rarely seen phenomenon,
that in order to stay alive,
To solve why Mukaido-san is still sleeping and why Shiodome-san has Ena...
We believe that your Ena is also a result
of your dormant sea-person powers awakening because you were pushed to the limit.
The professor would like to talk to you again.
Is there a day that works best for you?
When do you think we can see her?
Can you come out right now?
but it is gone down now.
She is been watching over you up until now.
There have not been any changes.
Hikari, I understand how you feel, but...
you should rely on those around you a bit more.
You are lecturing a sick person?
You are not the only one who cares about Manaka-chan.
Kaname-kun and Sayu-chan brought them by.
So you guys will not be behind in your studies.
You sure you are okay with that?
I guess I really am hard to understand.
The guys from Shishio are overflowing with emotions.
I have always been a little envious of that.
I do not know about me.
It is probably not a good thing.
Because I am not like Hikari and the others.
Before when Hikari saw my Ena,
he said I was just like them.
Why is Manaka-san losing her Ena
and why did I gain Ena?
I am the only one with different feelings toward Manaka-san.
I said something weird to Hikari and upset him.
If she does not ever wake up...
I thought of the worst thing.
Do I really not want Manaka-san to wake up?
seriously thought it would be better
if they did not wake up.
I felt like Chisaki would disappear from me,
once they woke up, I was really happy.
It is weird, is not it?
if I will be able to be happy, too.
It is hard for you because they are both precious to you.
I want to be able to be happy.
I want to be able to say I am glad
from the bottom of my heart.
Apparently they have taken notes for you while you were out.
Miuna and the others took them for you.
She is going to wake up, right?
There is something Sayu was telling me.
Strong feelings for someone have the ability to change something drastically.
She is pretty sure that you have
I am saying that you should kiss Manaka-san!
Either way, why would I do that?!
Because it is needed for her to wake up!
And why would that need a k-kiss?!
You are not supposed to get that mad at girls!
She was so energetic, it startled me.
Episode Twenty-One: The Messenger from the Bottom of the Sea
